titleStmt.title: Fouretene sermons of Barnardine Ochyne, concernyng the predestinacion and eleccion of god: very expediente to the settynge forth of hys glorye among hys creatures. Translated out of Italian in to oure natyve younge by A.C.
titleStmt.author: Ochino, Bernardino, 1487-1564.
Bacon, Anne Cooke, Lady, 1528?-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Day dwellynge ouer Aldersgate, [and] Wylliam Seres, dwellyng in Peter Colledge. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Peter Colledge. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum
